code: import axios from"axios";import Cookies from"js-cookie";import config from"../config/config.json";export const registration=async(nickName,password,repeatPass,callback)=>{if(password!==repeatPass){alert("Неправильное подтверждение пароля");}else try{const response=await axios.post("https://".concat(config.hostname,":").concat(config.port,"/api/auth/registration"),{nickName,password});callback();alert(response.data.message);}catch(e){alert(e);}};export const login=async(nickName,password,callback)=>{try{const response=await axios.post("https://".concat(config.hostname,":").concat(config.port,"/api/auth/login"),{nickName,password});const id=response.data.user.id;Cookies.set("userIdState",JSON.stringify(id),{expires:7});Cookies.set("loginState",JSON.stringify(nickName),{expires:7});callback();}catch(e){alert(e);}};
